STF, as always great upload!  you know I gotta have my Golden age heroes!  lol  BTW:  do you have any Idea when the next issue of Masks hits? How about  the Shadow, or even Godzilla 11? Thanks in  advance

you're welcome deadpool-8797. Mothra67, masks #5 was supposed to be out on 3/20 but they've been running late. the midtown comics site says it will be out next week (4/3), and that godzilla #11, shadow #11 and shadow - year one #2 are all 4/10 releases.
Thanks for the update!  Can't get enough of those books!
